title: (x) 'Best restaurants': Bold serif caps & Clarendon-like slab - Sentinel, Mercury {Antonio C, Chris K}
content:
Hi there,  
I am having a bit of trouble identifying the two slabs in this picture.  
"restaurants" seems to be a typeface very similar to Clarendon, but the lower case "t" is quite different.  
"BEST" also seems to be a different face altogether, but the former is driving me crazy.  
Any help would greatly be appreciated.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202121221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC00002_4596.jpg)
author: disarraygun
